ComicInfo.Summary: Prelude to Abuse - The Army of Darkness, lead by Number Ten "The Decimator", descends upon Springdale, Colorado. Its population is to be attacked, overrun and transformed. Mona Bahareh watches as the mayhem disrupts over the town. With the Tenth in their control, Mona Bahareh and her colleagues experience an issue with their programming of the Tenth. A third party has seemed to hack into the data banks of thier system. Trying to reestablish the memories of the Tenth, he starts to remember the past of how he had become to be. Rhazes Darkk has made him a monster and he uses that hatred again the Army of Darkness. Mona searches within her on facility for the third party but they have slipped out of her building without a trace. She then focuses back on the Tenth and triggers his wristarator. The story ends in Zorina and espy's bedroom and discuss the dreams which Espy was having of monsters....and so the it goes forth into the legendary 10th.
ComicInfo.Title: Prelude to Abuse
